== Contacts ==


First, you have to choose our application in main menu

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvxGxtcjI/AAAAAAAAACw/Mudl1LEeokg/screen__01_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvxnVRw0I/AAAAAAAAAC0/EkVBhQh4OuA/screen__02_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

I think, you'd like to view your contacts, which you can download from facebook:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvx7CZUcI/AAAAAAAAAC4/Tm3KtGp8fPM/screen__03_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

But if you have no contacts avalaible yet, you have to synchronize your facebook account at first:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvyVjgTjI/AAAAAAAAAC8/nq9SUkbpBCY/screen__04_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Juct press button "Log in":

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvyoEVDAI/AAAAAAAAADA/SG4A6l58ctU/screen__05_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Wait a few moments, please:

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvy5TcfPI/AAAAAAAAADE/usgfT3R1xyc/screen__06_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Then, put your e-mail, which registered in your facebook account:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvzFycRoI/AAAAAAAAADI/AGLolOLFOCI/screen__07_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

If you wrote it before, you'll see such picture:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvzpvYY2I/AAAAAAAAADM/5oWiWG_ScWI/screen__08_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Then, just write your password, and press the button "log in"

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBvz9_o3FI/AAAAAAAAADQ/sx4IsQDir-g/screen__09_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv0BxrkaI/AAAAAAAAADU/PVDX0pQiWuk/screen__10_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

If you'll make a mistake in your e-mail or password, you'll see:

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv0z-0t4I/AAAAAAAAADc/0xxF7kCEWGQ/screen__12_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

If you put it all right, you'll see next window:

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv1LRfAkI/AAAAAAAAADg/jyMx5UK7q4A/screen__13_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Just press button "Create" or "Создать":

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv1vAsqyI/AAAAAAAAADk/B-i6p0vzMyM/screen__14_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And you'll take your Autorization Token:

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv12QW3FI/AAAAAAAAADo/43XRIBiENbU/screen__15_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Enter your token:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv2XE_plI/AAAAAAAAADs/mTyYHR7AO4A/screen__16_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv2kzaSCI/AAAAAAAAADw/bd7iA7QSTI8/screen__17_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Press "Ok":

[http://lh4.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv3Bv_ZkI/AAAAAAAAAD0/YPT7Siz2ykQ/screen__18_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Wait a few moments:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv3a3dmfI/AAAAAAAAAD4/22LtZk5GQlw/screen__19_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And you are logged in!

[http://lh6.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv36Z-QSI/AAAAAAAAAD8/uUaDOOuuj00/screen__20_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

Now, you can start a sinchronization:

[http://lh3.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv4JKSt7I/AAAAAAAAAEA/8ebSJRq4gis/screen__21_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]

And wait a little, please:

[http://lh5.ggpht.com/_y543Ell7bU4/SiBv4Y8T_aI/AAAAAAAAAEE/h7XnIko4B2c/screen__22_%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD.%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80.jpg]
